The pure class interface. 
public abstract class Errors
  extends RuntimeException
Errors thrown by the session system. These exceptions need not to be declared in the throws class of method, and represent unexpected behavior.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: Errors.pizza,v 1.3 1998/11/22 15:18:41 buessow Exp $

AssertionFailed(String)
An assertion failed: a method of the session systems is called with arguments violating the
DataInconsistency(String)
A consistency error of the underlying data model.
PhysicalError(Exception)
A physical error of the underlying system layers, which does not represent an expected
RemoteMethodInvocationFailed()
Remote Exception occured during RMI.

PhysicalError
public case PhysicalError(Exception exception);
A physical error of the underlying system layers, which does not represent an expected failure.

DataInconsistency

public case DataInconsistency(String message);
A consistency error of the underlying data model.

AssertionFailed

public case AssertionFailed(String message);
An assertion failed: a method of the session systems is called with arguments violating the specification, or a tool adaptor does not behave has expected.

RemoteMethodInvocationFailed

public case RemoteMethodInvocationFailed();
Remote Exception occured during RMI.
